the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. Bloomberg News reported Thursday that the bonuses would average$ 10,000 for 10,755 salaried workers, but some who aren't covered by government pay restrictions could get up to half their salary. Details regarding salaried performance awards are considered confidential employment records, Ranieri said. Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy. deal as weakening Italy's system of national contracts, but other unions backed it as encouraging investment. The bitter campaign split Italy's powerful labor unions. Industry Minister Maurizio Sacconi hailed the victory. The outcome of the referendum opens an evolution in industrial relations, especially in large factories that should allow a better use of the plants and a real increase in salaries, Maurizio Sacconi told Italian state radio. Sergio Marchionne had pledged to link pay increases to productivity. But the flexible work rules also limit the right to strike during full production, and reduce break times and sick pay
